C

closeConnection() - Method in class DatabaseHandler
This method closes any open data base connection
crawlUsingPostAndSiteId(Integer, Integer, DatabaseHandler) - Static method in class BlogMining
This method crawls a particular post using its postID andd siteID
crawlUsingPostObject(Post, DatabaseHandler) - Static method in class BlogMining
This method crawls a particular post object of a site / blogger
crawlUsingPostUrl(String, DatabaseHandler) - Static method in class BlogMining
This method crawls a particular post using its URL
crawlUsingSiteID(Integer, DatabaseHandler) - Static method in class BlogMining
This method crawls all the posts of a site / blogger
